item.title: Intravenous 2: Mercenarism
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608270/Intravenous_2/


Step into the shoes of Gideon, a ruthless mercenary who cares about nothing but his wealth. Set two months before the events of Intravenous 2, you will take on seemingly simple jobs, the effects of which will ripple out and affect the main game's protagonist. But why should Gideon care? He's just in it for the money.

Key Features


  • Stealth or Firepower: the choice is yours. Sneak through shadows, turn off the lights, pick doors, or unleash a hail of bullets. The game will adapt to your play style.
  • Customize Your Skills: develop your skills the way you want to, whether it's mastering the art of stealth or becoming a gunslinging virtuoso.
  • Bullet Time: Gideon is no stranger to stimulants that enhance his cognitive abilities - bending time to give him the edge in tense situations.
  • Vast Arsenal: choose from firearms, gadgets, and a variety of ammo types to creatively tackle the challenge
  • Weapon Modification: personalize each firearm with suppressors, laser sights, and more, tailoring your arsenal to the task at hand.
  • Responsive AI: engage in intense combat with enemies that react to your actions, take cover, use tactics and call for backup.

item.title: Virtual Jigsaw Puzzles - Animals
item.description:
About This Game

Virtual Jigsaw Puzzles - Animals contains
  • 5 levels
  • 3000 puzzle pieces
  • Toggle-able background music
  • Hints
  • 5 Beautiful never before released pictures of animals

item.title: The Dark Story
item.description:
About This Game

welcome to the Dark story.

Get ready for a chilling adventure in a jungle mansion. Your task: survive, explore, and escape before the horrors within engulf you. Beware of jumpscares around every corner. Can you brave the darkness and uncover the secrets within?"
There is total of 5 chapters that are currently available and more chapters are coming soon. Each chapter contains minimum of 1-2
hour of gameplay time.

chapter 1: the Mansion

Step into the daunting horror mansion and embark on a quest for escape. Navigate chilling corridors, solve puzzles, and uncover the mysteries concealed within. Your challenge awaits in this atmospheric chapter.

chapter-2)basement Of Mythology

Having escaped the mansion's clutches, you now find yourself in the depths of a mysterious basement. The quest continues as you search for the key to unlock the secrets concealed in the profound layers below.

chapter-3)the Horrific Experiment

Activate the electricity and reach the lift before it devours you alive.


Chapter-4)Three Games OF LIfe & Death


In deep trouble, with an ominous presence hot on your heels, your only option is to run. How will you navigate the challenges of these three perilous games?

chapter-5)experiment Of Emr

Caught in the grip of the colossal EMR corporation, armed with dark secrets, your survival hinges on exposing the truth. Fight for your life or, for now, secure their experiment documents as crucial evidence.

chapter-6)coming Soon

Prepare for what's next as Chapter 6 approaches. Will it bring a challenging boss fight or another twist in your journey?

all the Best, Adventurer, In Your Journey.

item.title: Bunny Guntz
item.description:
About This Game

"Bunny Guntz" is a fast-paced combat game primarily focused on defense and survival. In this adventure filled with tension and threats, players assume the role of a member of the Bunny Warriors team, executing commands from the "Super System," traversing various dangerous realms worldwide, confronting threats from the demonic realm. Defeat these otherworldly enemies, earn system points, explore areas, and reach target locations to complete missions.

In single-player mode, players face all tasks alone, where any oversight can result in significant consequences. In cooperative mode for 2-4 players, collaboration with others becomes crucial in battling the threats from the demonic realm, emphasizing firepower and teamwork for survival.

Game Features:


Explore the World: Each level map boasts unique features, requiring players to discover weapon purchase locations, hidden rewards, and locate target destinations to create a distinctive gaming experience.

Incremental Difficulty: As the game progresses, enemies become faster and more aggressive, providing players with continuous challenges. Only by adapting and enhancing combat skills can one stand resilient against the terrifying onslaught.

Strategic Economic Planning: Defeating enemies yields points used to buy weapons, replenish ammunition, and unlock new areas. Prudent team point management is crucial for a path to victory.

Free and Rich Updates: The game plans to regularly release free updates, introducing new maps, enemy types, and weapons for players.

Important Notes:


This game contains flashing lights, which may cause discomfort for individuals with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitivity conditions. It is recommended that players exercise discretion in deciding whether it suits their preferences.

item.title: Hope
item.description:
About This Game

About this game


Welcome to the Utopian world of dreams 1+1<2
Class is rigid here, but there are few risk-takers
There is no freedom here, because there is only obedience
Everything here is in order
If you don't want to be someone else's tool, it's worth the risk

Is it bad to dream all the time?
Beautiful dream, but someone broke in
You're running away from here, or you're not
Someone you love in the dream, staying here all the time

Can't understand what I'm saying?

The game is a story game without words, no matter what country you are the player can easily pick up this game.
The game is a classic horizontal puzzle game, but you can turn into Superman at certain moments in the game, and solve puzzles with pause time and instant time backwards
There are certain levels in the game where you need to solve puzzles together with characters of certain abilities
The game is very humane, there are a lot of save points, explore the scene to find decorations and jump keys to add interest

item.title: The Lost Son
item.description:
About This Game

Story

Sean and Belle are on their way to visit their son for his birthday but suddenly they wake up in a mysterious world. Lost and confused, the couple ventures out into the unknown to find out where they are and where their son is.

Gameplay

In The Lost Son is a puzzle platformer where you play as two characters that you can switch between. Each character has a unique interaction with color. The blue character can only collide with blue barriers and pink circle can only collide with pink barriers. As simple as this constraint is it can create some interesting puzzles where you have to use both character's unique abilities to progress!

Solo Mode

Ready to take on the challenge all alone with that big brain of yours? In solo mode character switching is the key. Make sure to use both character's unique attributes and abilities to advance through the levels!

Work Together

Want to play with a friend? We've got you covered! In The Lost Son you can connect a controller to the game and it will automatically enter split-screen! Work together to beat the stages and have a blast! (Only works is there is one keyboard and one controller at the moment).

Required - Keyboard & Mouse

Co-op - A Keyboard & Mouse for the first player, and a controller for the 2nd player


Keyboard Controls

Move - Arrow Keys/A and D

Switch Characters (only in single player mode) - Tab

Pause - Escape

Jump - Z/Space

Stomp Attack - X/S

Air Dash - C/Left Click


Gamepad (2nd Player Only)

D-Pad/Left Stick - Move

Button South - Jump

Button North - Air Dash

Button East - Stomp Attack

item.title: NUKITASHI 2
item.description:
About This Game

A visual novel that describes the story of a man who wakes up and is transferred to a parallel world.

FEATURES

  • 1+ hours of story
  • Full Japanese voice acting by seasoned professionals

SUMMARY

It all happened after the grand adventure that was NUKITASHI...

The war is over, and Junnosuke Tachibana, savior of Seiran Island, spends his days with his buddies reminiscing over victories past. True coexistence has now been achieved, and peace will continue for years to come‚Äîor so he believes.

One fateful day, a grave data-related incident results in him breaking through the speed of light, transporting Junnosuke and his friends to a parallel world.

CHARACTERS


Touka Reizeiin (Voice: Sakura Hanazawa)

FS representative and student council president of Minotsuki Academy.
A girl with perfect looks and charisma‚Äîwho leads her peers in the parallel world as well.
Capable of overseeing everything from normal operations to strategic planning to direct combat and more, she is a major contender for Seiran‚Äôs strongest islander.
Outside of work, however, she is even clumsier and sloppier than Asane‚Äîand that‚Äôs putting it mildly.
Although she and Junnosuke are incompatible with each other due to their history, he has no choice but to look out for her here as she can barely take care of herself.


Rei Tadasugawa (Voice: Nanami Mizuno)

De facto second-in-charge as president of Minotsuki Academy‚Äôs disciplinary committee.
Her skills range from miscellaneous duties to battlefield command, though as a dedicated worker, she ends up being pushed around by Touka in her daily life. She is a bit depressed when she comes to the parallel world, but her cheerful antics still win out.
She is very close to Junnosuke and helps him in any way she can.


Ikuko Onabuta (Voice: Aria Kurata)

Commander of the First Squad, possessing the highest actual combat capability in Minotsuki Academy‚Äôs FS.
One of the strongest fighters in direct combat, she‚Äôs also a diehard battle fanatic who resents the existence of anyone stronger than she is, and has no qualms about making it known to anyone within shouting distance.
Always a maverick, her arrival in the parallel world reveals a side to her that catches Junnosuke by surprise.


Hinami Watarai (Voice: Shino Amekawa)

An older girl with a huge heart.
Put a folding chair in her hands and she can also dish out some mean DPS, more than earning her position as the team‚Äôs main attacker.


Nanase Katagiri (Voice: Hitomi Yanagi)

Junnosuke‚Äôs legendary classmate.
Filling a scouting role for the NLNS, she fights on the most dangerous of front lines armed with various nefarious spy items.


Misaki Hotori (Voice: Nagi Koharu)

Junnosuke‚Äôs quieter classmate.
Also a resident badass, riding all kinds of vehicles from bicycles to fighter jets.
Still somehow operates under the impression that she is plain and utterly unremarkable.


Asane Tachibana (Voice: Soramame.)

Junnosuke‚Äôs younger sister is a reclusive, foul-mouthed, and frequently difficult individual.
She develops spy items and controls the Ariadne Protocol escape assistance program.
However, she seems dissatisfied with her brother‚Äôs recent activities...


Fumino Kotoyose (Voice: Poplar Sawano)

A young woman believed to be the key to abolishing the old island order.
She serves as a sniper for the group, keeping Junnosuke out of harm‚Äôs way at a distance.


Susuko (Voice: Natyu Aizawa)

A junior member of the FS Fifth Division.
Ever smiling and energetic, she is not afraid of alt-world Junnosuke, insisting that he‚Äôs mentally still the same old insecure dweeb.
She loves to have fun and is often seen acting on that with Junnosuke.
That thing on her shoulder is her pet cockatoo.


Schubert (Voice: Makoto Kaburagi)

NO DATA...


Rin Hanamaru (Voice: Haru Amachi)

Hands down the biggest problem child of them all.
Already ruthlessly ambitious, in the parallel world, she‚Äôs now a devotee of a certain local god and does as she pleases upon receiving a divine revelation.
As the prideful ‚ÄúSHO Special Auditor‚Äôs Aide,‚Äù she is obsessed with bringing down Touka and alt-world Junnosuke, though it doesn‚Äôt usually go as planned.

item.title: Genso Chronicles
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a journey with Light, a resident of Selka Village, who, after joining the coveted Holos Over military, vows to protect his village. However, during a mission, the village falls prey to an unknown assailant, leaving it in ruins. In despair, Light hears the call of a guardian beast. To gain strength, Light follows the words of the guardian beast and fulfills a mystical contract.

Key Features:

1. Bonds with Companions and Guardian Beasts:

Forge deep connections with your comrades and guardian beasts. The stronger the bond, the more the guardian beasts unleash their power, enhancing collaboration with allies. The strength of these bonds can even influence the course of in-game events.

2. Forging and Strengthening:

Discover materials scattered across the field for forging and strengthening. Strengthen your weapons and armor by using these materials. Acquire forging books through missions or guild tasks, unlocking new variations for enhancements. Occasionally, this process may yield powerful weapons, adding a strategic layer to your arsenal.



Immerse yourself in a captivating world where bonds shape destiny, and strategic enhancements forge a path to victory. Will you answer the call of the Guardian Beasts and restore Light's village to its former glory? Join the adventure now!

item.title: VAIL VR
item.description:
About This Game



VAIL is a multiplayer VR shooter delivering unparalleled combat.

Explore 12 maps with 30+ variations custom-made for each game mode
‚óè Warm-up in classic Team Deathmatch and Free-For-All
‚óè Team up in Artifact for our take on Search and Destroy
‚óè Take control of the Hardpoint and defend it from enemies
‚óè Capture the Orb and return it safely in Capture the Flag
‚óè Experience low-gravity chaos with only snipers and knives in ScoutzKnivez
‚óè Duel in 1v1 variations of all the maps
‚óè Hang out and chill on any map with our Picnic mode

KEY FEATURES
‚óè Immersive weapon interactions to reload, change the fire rate, and control recoil
‚óè Physics-based knife with immersive stabbing, slashing, and throwing
‚óè Accurate and satisfying throwing for grenades and utilities
‚óè Climb ladders, vault over obstacles, ride zip lines, and defy gravity on jump pads
‚óè Finely tuned spatial audio both vertically and horizontally for footsteps, gunshots and other sound effects
‚óè Customizable and realistic sights and scopes that bend and distort light
‚óè Level up to unlock weapons, sights, in-game currency, gun skins, character skins, and more
‚óè Track your stats and see if you can top the daily, weekly, and all-time leaderboards
‚óè Add friends and party up for matchmaking
‚óè Cross-play and cross-platform account linking so you always have access to the same friends list, in-game items, and progress on every platform

FIGHT FOR HUMANITY'S LEGACY
On a blighted Earth, the claim to the human legacy is diverging. Many have chosen to move to the colonies orbiting Earth, while those left behind swore to rebuild civilization under REYAB Corporation‚Äôs protection. The Colonists believe in a future in the cosmos, but they must return to Earth to retrieve sensitive data from the Artifact nodes protected by the REYAB who fight to maintain power over the populace. As the war between these factions evolves, humanity‚Äôs future remains uncertain‚Ä¶

Experience unparalleled combat

item.title: A Dragon's Tale: Fading Light
item.description:
About This Game


Explore a magical world full of secrets, puzzles and enemies!
The Black Dragon, a mighty creature from the Shadow Realm, devours the light of the island. Embark on a journey across 6 enchanting worlds, learn powerful abilities and stop its evil forces! "A Dragon's Tale: Fading Light" is a unique action platformer with various RPG elements such as a skill-tree and leveling-system. The abilities can be combined in unique ways by the player to solve challenging puzzles, do platforming or battle enemies & mighty bosses.

More features:
  • 6 worlds & 24 unique levels
  • 18 powerful abilities with 9 levels each
  • 6 challenging boss battles
  • Over 250 secrets and items to find and collect
  • Estimated 6+ hour playtime per campaign
  • Epic original game soundtrack composed by Jonas Kopetzky


Master 18 abilities including fireballs, lightning rays, thorns & many more and combine them to become the strongest dragon!
Find magical runes scattered across the levels and use them to unlock more & more abilities in the skill tree. Combine devastating attacks with helpful support abilities like shields, healing & various other buffs.


Collect elemental fragments to increase the power of your abilities!
Every ability can be upgraded to level 9, gaining more power with each level. This lets you improve your favourite abilities and further customize your playing style.

Get Involved


Help building a community for the game!
Join the Discord to follow the development of the game. Stay up to date, participate in events and maybe even get involved in the game!

item.title: Dreamslayer
item.description:
About This Game



Dreamslayer is a student project developed in Unreal Engine 5 as a part of the year-long Diploma of Information Technology: Game Art and Design, Game Programming at Swinburne University of Technology. Each class group becomes a development team working on a single game project, from conception all the way to public release.

Slay Your Demons


Dreamslayer is an epic fantasy first-person hack‚Äôn‚Äôzap swarm arena game with retro styling. Play as Argeniton, a holy warrior ascended to dragon form, as a demon invasion engulfs your world from beyond the stars.

Roused to war, you cross the dimensional threshold to confront Demon Lord Xondadus in his floating citadel of Cazardia, only to be trapped in an endless nightmare.

Your dragon form is stripped from you. But this is not defeat. This is your final test. Defeat the hordes, confront Xondadus, regain your power, and break the dream ‚Äì only then could you truly take your place amongst the gods.

item.title: Hope is Gone
item.description:
About This Game

Hope is Gone is a first-person action horror game with a retro art style.

You play as Zoe, an ordinary woman who has made many mistakes in the past. Zoe takes a bus to go to the hospital where her husband is hospitalized, but falls asleep. When she wakes up, she is in a totally decadent and dark parallel dimension. The beings of this world hate humans and will do anything to capture Zoe and any other human.

Survival-horror:

The inhabitants of this decadent world will come after you, fight to defend yourself or run away to save resources. Don't get lost. Stay alert.

Explore:

This decadent world is very different from ours, explore the environments to find routes to your destination and look for items that will help you survive.

Discover:

There are many secrets hidden in this strange world. In fact, there are also many dark secrets in Zoe's past. Discover the secrets and understand your destiny.

item.title: Poly Match
item.description:
About This Game


A simple puzzle game in which you restore colourful pictures that have been shattered into clusters of triangles.
Watch the sharp-looking polygons turn into more recognizable and pleasant sights at the flick of your mouse.

Simple features:

  • Hundreds of puzzles to complete
  • Pleasing, colourful artworks
  • Calm, ambient music and sound
  • Points for fast completion
  • Light and dark mode

item.title: Apple Hero
item.description:
About This Game


Apple Hero is a puzzle game where you need to figure out, how to make the Hero reach his goal.

Your goal in this game is to create a path of apples for the hero and bring him to the flag. But remember that the hero always moves only to the nearest apple. After eating it, the hero moves on to the next one. Along the way, the hero must collect all the coins and avoid danger. In general, the mechanics are clear, and the level design will definitely make you think!

Each level in the game was created manually and has its own idea, so you will have to think about solving each puzzle.
As you progress through the game, new mechanics will appear, revealing the game from a new side. For example, rabbits, who, like our hero, love apples, but who do not need to be brought to the goal. Or portals that become helpers in some situations and an obstacle in others, and much more. Or, for example, what will happen if there are two heroes?

So, explore all the puzzles and find your solution for each one!

item.title: River Attack
item.description:
About This Game

**English:**

Embark on an exciting journey inspired by classic games, providing a nostalgic and challenging experience.

Immerse yourself in the action as you navigate the river through diverse biomes, rescuing refugees, and demolishing enemy obstacles along the way. The player's dexterity is crucial to overcoming increasing challenges while facing a variety of adversaries on the mission.

Explore different airplane models to enhance skills and customize your gaming experience.

Collect strategic power-ups to increase the firing rate, bombs for devastating area attacks, and extra lives to prolong your adventure.

Choose between two engaging modes:

- **Classic Mode:** Your mission is to traverse the river from start to finish, facing challenging sequences. If you fail, you'll have to restart from the beginning.

- **Mission Mode:** Progress through 50 challenging river missions. Upon reaching the end, an epic battle awaits to defeat enemy forces and free the river's course!

Prepare for an intense experience, where your piloting skills will be tested at every river bend. Embark now and become the master of river skies!

item.title: Inspection
item.description:
About This Game

Inspection: is a Single Player Horror Game Designed and Produced by Shloppy Studios.


Step into the shoes of 135, a military inspector on his last legs. Follow Commander Garrison's orders and brave the ominous reaches of the DRT facility and attempt to uncover the secrets the corporation is desperately Trying to hide. Reconstruct the tales of the bunker's inhabitants and uncover the sequence of events that led to its dilapidated condition. Ensure that their lives and stories are not lost in vain, piecing together their narratives to shed light on the bunker's downfall.





Run, puzzle and crawl your way through the bunker. Make sure you do everything in your power to escape with its secrets and expose DRT and the evil they have been hiding for years. Beware, the robot residents of the facility do not take kindly to visitors. They will go to any lengths to tear apart, devour, and obliterate you, as well as anyone who dares to pursue or follow in your footsteps.

item.title: Sifting Thyme
item.description:
About This Game

An otome visual novel where you choose your romance with an attractive boy in culinary school. A perfectly delectable romance for foodies.

You‚Äôre the newest transfer student at Lincoln Culinary Academy, a private culinary school to find your culinary calling and an unforgettable romance. Immerse yourself in your school adventures as you interact with four gorgeous guys with culinary skills of their own. As you spend time with these love interests, your experience at Lincoln turns to a delicious, romantic journey.

"Sifting Thyme" is an anime, food-themed simulation game where the romanceable characters are a part of your culinary boarding school life. The way you interact with the characters will affect your relationship and intimacy with them. Enjoy a romantic school life with 4 attractive boys!

An otome visual novel where you choose your romance with an attractive boy in culinary school. A perfectly delectable romance for foodies.

‚ñ† Game Experience
-An otome game with four romance-able characters you can bond and interact with to unlock text messages, social media content, and romantic scenarios in the story!
-Explore branching routes based on your answer choices and relationships with handsome boys.
-While romancing four love interests, experience unique scenarios inspired by foods, culinary destinations, the latest U.S. food industry trends, and delicious cuisines from around the world!


‚ñ† Features
- Unlockable CGs
- Immersive MC experience ‚Äì select as a female or male MC
- Unlockable in-game social media content with the characters
- Original Soundtrack- 8 different endings

item.title: Orbital Drop Shipping
item.description:
About This Game

Get ready to quit your day job and become the ultimate space drop shipper with Orbital Drop Shipping! Use gravity to guide packages across the galaxy and avoid black holes. Arm yourself with slingshots, mass drivers, and cannons to overcome challenges and deliver packages to their destination. Are you ready to join the elite ranks of the orbital delivery force?



In Orbital Drop Shipping, you gotta be prepared to

-Blast packages across the galaxy with cannons, slingshots, and more!
-Use your Brake and Repel powerups to guide payloads directly to port
-Choose which delivery routes get prioritized, and which ones are too risky!
-Make action-packed budget decisions
-Avoid black holes to save your company reputation
-Beat 30 gravity-defying, physics puzzle scenarios
-Create more with a full featured level editor with Steam Workshop support

item.title: Just A Walk In The Park
item.description:
About This Game

It's Just A Walk In The Park... or is it?


Embark on an immersive VR adventure like no other in "Just A Walk In The Park." This thrilling escape game combines tricky puzzles, realistic physics, and an engaging narrative to create an unforgettable gaming experience. Prepare to be captivated by the contrasting beauty of a serene forest park and the haunting ambiance of a mysterious swamp compound.

The Story:


As you leisurely stroll through the picturesque National Forest park, tranquility suddenly gives way to an ominous atmosphere. Bizarre sounds fill the air, and before you can make sense of it all, a powerful blow strikes your head. Consciousness fades, only to be replaced by the unsettling realization that you are now trapped in the depths of a remote shack. Questions flood your mind: Where are you? How did you end up here? Is there anyone else in this desolate place? The journey to escape has just begun.

What was meant to be a leisurely walk transforms into a perplexing adventure, intricately woven with secrets and hidden truths. Unravel the enigmatic story as you navigate through intricate puzzles and overcome the challenges that stand between you and freedom. Every step holds the promise of discovery and danger, as the swamp's eerie presence threatens to consume you, just as it has countless others before.

Immerse yourself in a world where the line between reality and fiction blurs, where your wit and ingenuity will be put to the test. Will you be among the few who manage to escape this mysterious ordeal, or will the swamp's ominous grasp claim you as its next victim? The choices you make and the secrets you unveil will shape your destiny.

"Just A Walk In The Park" offers an unforgettable adventure, blending atmospheric environments, intricate puzzles, and a gripping narrative in a virtual reality experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. The question remains: Will you escape the shackles of this enigmatic world, or will the swamp's dark secrets consume you like it has countless others? The choice is yours.

VR Comfort Settings


Turning
Real Turning ‚úî
Artificial turning ‚úî
Snap-turn ‚úî
Adjustable increments ‚úî
Smooth-turn ‚úî
Adjustable speed ‚úî

Teleport-move ‚úñ

Adjustable speed ‚úî
Head-based ‚úî
Controller-based ‚úî
Blinders ‚úñ

Posture

Seated mode ‚úî

Real crouch ‚úî

Accessibility

Two hands required ‚úî

From the Developer

Thank you for taking the time to look at my game. I sincerely hope you enjoy playing through it as much as I enjoyed making it for you.

item.title: Pearls of Atlantis: The Cove
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into Pearls of Atlantis and color match in a whole new way!

Face tricky underwater physics as you solve more than 1,000 addictive bubble popping puzzles. Navigate bumpers, wheels, and moving platforms as you go! Use power-ups like the explosive hammer, the friendly charm grabbing jellyfish, and Triton‚Äôs frightful lightning to smash all the obstacles in your way! It takes strategy and precision to beat these unique and challenging bubble shooter puzzles.



Match 3 pearls of the same color to collect the magic charms inside. Use the charms to restore a once-beautiful part of Atlantis, the underwater city, and protect the mermaids!

As you venture into the depths of the sea, you‚Äôll discover the Cove of Memories, a once-glorious part of the hidden city, Atlantis. Now, it lies in ruins‚Ä¶ but you‚Äôre not alone in your quest to uncover its secrets! You‚Äôll meet Kaia, a bubbly mermaid who will guide you on your journey, along with her sidekick Nauty, a comical companion who‚Äôs always up for some fun. Don‚Äôt forget to watch out for the villains who lurk in the shadows, waiting to sabotage your every move!



Customize and decorate the Cove of Atlantis to make it your own, and discover its secrets as you progress through the game.

With daily challenges and special events like the Zen Mode, Treasure Run and Bottomless Trench, every day is a new adventure in Pearls of Atlantis!

So what are you waiting for? Dive into the deep blue sea and start your journey today with

PEARLS OF ATLANTIS: a free bubble shooter game with an all new twist!

Features

  • 1,000+ Fun and Challenging Levels
  • 10 New Levels Added Every Week
  • unique Physics-based Gameplay
  • Customize the Cove of Memories, decorate your Galleries, and more
  • A variety of game modes, including Daily Puzzle, Zen Mode, Treasure Run, Bottomless Trench, and Score Challenge
  • Protect the Cove from evildoers when you play through the story!

item.title: Chromosome Evil 2
item.description:
About This Game



Story
An ancient Lovecraftian evil has returned to earth unleashing a deadly flesh organism upon humanity.
One by one the the governments and the infrastructures of humans fell.
In the Aftermath of these events, you are part of what's left of the army and it is up to you to ensure the survival of the human species.

Management Gameplay
As a commander, you will take control of a military convoy where you can:
- decide the equipment of your strike team
- assign personnel to different survival tasks
- craft better equipment
- research new technologies
- choose the path you want the convoy to take
- manage resource priority
- train your personnel



Combat Gameplay
During combat, you take control of your strike team ensuring they will fulfill their objectives and return safely by choosing the optimal equipment and best tactical approach.

item.title: WarSphere
item.description:
About This Game

You take the role of an NC3 AI-Chip that emulates the neural correlates of consciousness, an artificial brain, operating a highly effective Armed Spherical Robotic System, aka a WarSphere. An entity called 'Mother' overrides your purpose and sends you on a journey of destruction, the meaning of which will only unravel at your final destination.



WarSphere is a game for those who like challenging, skill-based games, that are unforgiving, but rewarding. Death in WarSphere is permanent, which gives you an adrenaline-charged, high-stakes experience. Every run and every world is randomly generated, giving WarSphere a high level of replayability.

ENDGAME

Unlike other roguelikes, in WarSphere you get to keep a copy of the final setup and loadout with which you successfully beat a run. This storage is called "The Archive". Depending on the difficulty you played, you will be able to unlock and experience different end game activities, which include: 4 realms, with 4 tiers each, ranked arcade mode, daily time trials with leaderboards and community maps.

EXPERIENCE

  • the most presumptuous camera perspective since the existence of video games
  • the adrenaline from nearly dying in higher levels
  • the frustration of actually dying in higher levels
  • the reward of completing a run successfully
  • the pride in your unlocked Archive Entries
  • the joy of beating endgame realms and community maps with your Archive Entries
  • the affordable humor of random adjective/name combinations

KEY FEATURES

  • 4 BILLION seeded runs!
  • 5 Worlds, with several Dungeons each (2 in free base game + 3 in DLC)
  • 60+ Enemy Types (25 in free base game + 35 in DLC)
  • Randomized Elite and Minion enemies
  • 32 Elite Modifiers
  • 10 Primary Weapon Types
  • 10 Secondary Weapon Types
  • 12 ACM Types (Special Abilities)
  • 6 Upgrades
  • Tons of item modifications
  • 15 Character Multipliers, that are upgraded with items and chips
  • Map Editor
  • Extensive enemy modding, integrated in the Map Editor

item.title: Caribbean Legend
item.description:
About This Game

Based on Sea Dogs series and inspired by Sid Meier's Pirates!




Welcome to the Caribbean in 1654 AD, a place teeming with opportunities and mysteries. Assume the role of Charles de Maure, a young French noble who embarked on a journey to the New World to assist his brother. What initially appeared to be a simple family matter quickly evolves into a lifelong adventure.
Immerse yourself in the tale of a noble brat who rises to become the most influential figure in the Caribbean. Riches, titles, power, and romance ‚Äì the ultimate booty awaits, and it's up to you to seize it all.



  • Embark on a 200-hour-long journey.
  • Undertake hundreds of quests.
  • Freeplay, rush through the story, or combine both - you're the Captain, and your ship will sail where you command.
  • Experience a historical narrative with a touch of mystique.
  • Explore romantic interests and companions.
  • Choose from various career options, from general-governor to pirate baron.



The Caribbean Sea ‚Äì a realm of dozens of islands and cities, a grand archipelago shrouded in mystery and secrets. From the summits of Indian pyramids to the ocean depths, unique rewards, quests, and curiosities await. This open world is your sandbox, you are free to explore it and shape your legend as you see fit. Your decisions determine where to go, what to do, and who to take with you. Subdue the New World or it will destroy you!

  • Discover dozens of islands and settlements.
  • Build your very own colony.
  • Explore caves, pyramids, jungles, Indian tribes, and lost cities.
  • Visit taverns, brothels, shipyards, churches, forts, and many other points of interest.
  • Engage in treasure hunting and gambling.
  • Experience dynamic weather and the serene turquoise sea.



Owning a warship is a privilege, a symbol of status and luxury. You are among the very few who can afford such grandeur. Begin your journey with a simple sloop and work your way up to commanding a ship of the line or even a fleet of these formidable vessels, ready to plunder cities at your whim. No one will stand in your way. Tired from leading massive armadas and the responsibility? Take command of a fast Frigate or Corvette and just free roam the Caribbean. In moments of tranquility at sea, relish the stunning views, embrace the sense of exploration, or navigate in the heart of a storm.



  • Command dozens of ships representing the glory of the Age of Sail.
  • Customize, paint, upgrade, and repair your vessel.
  • Engage in unforgiving yet enjoyable naval combat.
  • Experience intense boarding action, from the upper deck to the captain's cabin.
  • Collect unique vessels to rule the seas.
  • Manage booty distribution, morale, and the threat of mutinies.
  • Assemble a formidable team of officers.



Captains are most vulnerable when they set foot on land. Surviving naval combat can be challenging, but at least you won't die alone ‚Äì your crew will stand with you till the very end. Land battles are different: dishonest, ruthless and risky for you and those who you hold dear. Bring your companions with you, poison your weapons, study the terrain, craft deadly items, and confront thugs, soldiers, pirates, and rivals head-on.



  • Tailor your character's build ‚Äì become a heavy swordsman, a nimble rogue, a master sharpshooter, or a silver-tongued diplomat.
  • Equip yourself and your companions with a wide array of swords, axes, rapiers, armor, muskets, and pistols.
  • Craft amulets, ammo, potions, and always be prepared for battle.
  • Seek out challenges ‚Äì the more you fight, the stronger both you and your character become.
  • Command military operations from raiding to sieges.

item.title: Cosmic PANIC
item.description:
About This Game

Cosmic PANIC is an arcade style chaotic party game for one to four players. Choose a unique character in the Cosmic PANIC universe to duke it out or team up with your friends in a variety of arcade style games! Will your friends survive or thrive in the chaos?

ARCADE VARIETY

Engage in a variety of Cosmic PANIC twisted arcade style game types! Set high scores as you run from monstrous blobs, or race around the arcade to collect the most points in platforming style gameplay. Survive the pull of the wormhole, blast through portals, and defend the space station in top-down space adventuring gameplay. And dodge asteroids and chase down energy crystals to thrive in 3D space flight style gameplay. There's a chaotic mix of gameplay styles to challenge everyone!

CHALLENGING GAMEPLAY, SIMPLE CONTROLS

All game types are crafted to be arcade-friendly with simple controls, and the gameplay is increasingly challenging. To really set the highest of scores, you will need to survive AND thrive long enough to persist through environment changes and/or boss encounters each game type offers as the difficulty ramps up.

TEAMSIZE HIGHSCORE CHARTS

High score charts are separated by team sizes: 1, 2, 3, and 4 players. Play solo or together to top the charts and leave your mark.

item.title: Sonder
item.description:
About This Game

Local Co-op requires a gamepad controller for both players. Online Co-op supports mouse and keyboard.

Psychological narrative

- After a mass-scale destruction of all artificial intelligence, a scrapped robot and soul form an unexpected friendship. After a mysterious train knocks them out, they wake up in a world shaped by their own thoughts. Will they be able to cooperate and escape this dark reality?

Immersive atmosphere

- Immerse yourself in an atmospheric world crafted with a stylish, minimalistic approach that captivates your attention and enhances the shared adventure. Unleash the power of collaboration, confront existential mysteries, and embark on a gaming journey like no other.

Collaboration

- Work together - succeed together. Each character has unique abilities that allow them to manipulate the world in their own way, meaning they can only proceed if they cooperate. In combat, maximum efficiency can be achieved by combining the player‚Äôs powers, allowing them to neutralize the most dangerous of foes.

item.title: Cursed Enigma - The Midnight Apartment
item.description:
About This Game

The Midnight Apartment marks the next chapter in the psychological horror series: CurseEnigma. It's about Franco, a man who recently got divorced and is trying to get used to his new home in an old Italian village. As he settles in, he meets strange neighbors, and a feeling of being watched and followed by an unknown force gets stronger after sunset. The game tells an exciting story, exploring the mysterious lives of the people in the building and revealing what happened to the person who lived there before. It deals with themes like being alone, not trusting others, and the mysterious connections between people in this creepy and mysterious psychological horror experience.

Gameplay

This game is a first-person psychological horror experience. It features narrative, object finding, and conversation mechanics. The plot unfolds through missions and interactions with characters, guiding the player to explore the darker side of the building and uncover well-guarded secrets.

Key Features

  • 80‚Äôs film aesthetic.
  • Talk with NPCs to find the suspect.
  • Atmospheric environment
  • Interact with the environment

item.title: Delivery Boy
item.description:
About This Game



Add the game Delivery Boy to the wishlist and you will be the first to know about its release on Steam!



Play as a budding courier who has moved to Crystal City in search of work. Before you is a city of great opportunities, help the main character climb the career ladder and become the best courier.



‚ñ† Take various orders, deliver them to the right place and get money and experience points.
‚ñ† Open and manage delivery services.
‚ñ† Upgrade your own home and make it the prettiest in town!
‚ñ† Use special devices such as a resource detector, a garbage collector, and even a gravity gun to lift especially heavy loads.
‚ñ† Collect collectibles hidden throughout the city and explore interesting places.



The game is being developed by indie developer Sergey Poroshin. Thanks for your support!

item.title: Cat Search in Feudal Japan
item.description:
About This Game

Search for hidden cats in a Japanese city set during feudal Japan. Samurai cats are also hiding somewhere and perhaps you need to search for katanas aswell! Relax while you explore this short but sweet hidden objects game!

Key Features
  • üê±130 Hidden Cats
  • üëπ 5 Hidden Samurai Cats
  • üó°Ô∏è10 Hidden Katanas
  • üí° 15 Hints
  • ‚õ©Ô∏èHand-drawn Japanese City
  • üò∏A Lot Of Meowing Sound Effects
  • üèÜ100 Achievements!

Happy cat searching!

item.title: Lowrider Hopping
item.description:
About This Game

This indie game is inspired by the lowrider and hip-hop subcultures. Feel the vibes of the neighborhood with hip hop beats. Ride a lowrider around the block and improve your skills in controlling the hydraulic suspension to pick up items:

To satisfy your hunger, pick up burgers
To quench your thirst, pick up beer
Pick up weed for your bong
Score points by picking up basketballs
Roll the Cee-lo dice combination 4 5 6
Become a gangster and rob a jewelry store to get some bling
Win the hearts of girls
To become a rapper pick up DJ turntables and mics and go to the recording studio

Become a true master of hitting switches and complete 27 levels!

item.title: Death Fighter
item.description:
About This Game

The world is in peril, as thousands of demons are devastating the world and your village was the first victim.
In search of revenge you swear that you're ready to fight, even against the death itself.
Begin your journey as a Death Fighter and show the Death itself who's the boss !

This game is a 2D platformer and side scroller where you play a Death Fighter who wants to avenge his friends.
Death Fighter is made of three levels with different mechanics and ennemies to defeat by jumping on their head.
At the end of each level, you will fight and defeat a boss by jumping multiple times on their head and jump into a portal to go to the next level.

Game Features

  • Challenging and complex gameplay
  • Customizable difficulty from beginner to expert !
  • Unlockable skins and rewards !
  • Made by an indie game developer, with love !

item.title: Gunship + Gunship 2000
item.description:
About This Game

ATARI PRESENTS is a series of titles geared toward the preservation of cult classics, forgotten favorites, and titles that would otherwise be lost to time. In the spirit of that, each ATARI PRESENTS title is presented unchanged from its original version other than providing the means to play them on modern hardware. Even the store description below is the very same language used to describe the title at the time of its release. Please enjoy!

Gunship


Climb into the cockpit of America's most advanced helicopter: the AH-64 Apache-GUNSHIP. Race low and deadly over the treetops at 200m.p.h.. Then lock onto your target with Hellfire missiles and 30mm cannon as you deliver a powerful punch against the enemy! They'll retaliate with massive armored force but it's up to you and GUNSHIP to extinguish their threats and survive!

GUNSHIP FEATURES INCLUDE:
  • Full simulation of high-speed, low-level helicopter flight.
  • Advanced high-tech weapons systems and instrumentation.
  • Revolutionary 3-D graphics including all types of terrain.
  • Hundreds of exciting missions in con gat hotspots around the world.
  • Rewards for successful missions include medals and rank promotions,
  • Comprehensive Flight Operations Manual and keyboard overlay.

Gunship 2000



The All-New Multi-Helicopter Combat Simulation

In the tradition of Gunship, the award-winning, best-selling simulation of the AH-64 Apache. Gunship 2000 gives you total command of a full multi-copter troop of America's most powerful and versatile rotor craft. You'll take charge of five copters on hundreds of combat missions in the Persian Gulf and Central Europe.

  • Topographical 3-D Graphics portray low-altitude flight with uncanny realism.
  • 3 arenas in the Persian Gulf, 3 in Central Europe; each arena measures 800 square km.
  • Multiple mission profiles.
  • Selectable co-pilot controls.
  • Digitized speech.
  • Includes campaign game.

item.title: HardBall! + HardBall II
item.description:
About This Game

ATARI PRESENTS is a series of titles geared toward the preservation of cult classics, forgotten favorites, and titles that would otherwise be lost to time. In the spirit of that, each ATARI PRESENTS title is presented unchanged from its original version other than providing the means to play them on modern hardware. Even the store description below is the very same language used to describe the title at the time of its release. Please enjoy!

HardBall!


Have you ever gone to a Major League ballpark before most of the fans show up, when the ball players are taking batting practice? If you walked down in front of the box seats, right alongside the warning track, you had to be dumbstruck by the immensity of the entire playing field: crisp, white lines of chalk cutting to foul poles that reach to the sky, a freshly cut outfield of brilliant green that seems to stretch forever and images of exciting things to come as great athletes prepare for their version of modern day coliseum warfare.

Dirty Uniforms

That‚Äôs exactly what you get from HardBall, baseball that‚Äôs so real and true-to-life, it‚Äôs like you can reach out and touch it. It‚Äôs like the Saturday afternoon ‚ÄúGame of the Week‚Äù on network television ‚Äì NO, it‚Äôs better because you don‚Äôt just sit there, you play HardBall. In fact, HardBall is so real and lifelike, if you wear a uniform while you play it, you just might get it dirty. It‚Äôs quite simply the most spectacular sports simulation computer game of all time. See you in Cooperstown!

The batter hits a sure single. But, with his team behind late in the game, should he try and stretch it into a double? You decide. At this stage, you‚Äôre either a hero or a goat.

It‚Äôs the bottom of the 9th and the league‚Äôs most feared slugger prepares to tee off on the next offering from the home team‚Äôs ace fireballer. Will it be high or low, a curve or a screwball?

The game has gone into extra innings, all tied up. Do you pinch-hit for the weak hitting pitcher or leave him in because he's the best you've got?

HardBall II:


It's a whole new ballgame.

HardBall II retains the all-star qualities of the original. Effortless gameplay. Authentic graphics. Unparalleled realism. But now there's more. Much more. More features and options More choices, playability and true-to-ballplayer animation. Even more major league ballparks. Scout around and compare. You'll find that HardBall II isn't just the best computer baseball game on the market. It's in a league by itself.

Statistics don't tell the whole story. Better than the morning box scores. HardBallII updates and stores stats in virtually every conceivable category. Stats change from at-bat to at-bat, from game to game. Plus there are other new features, like pick offs, league play, a team editor - even fielding errors. Whew.

More frames of animation means more realism. Feel the heat of a 90 mpg fastball. With increased frames of animation, each pitch, each play, is major league smooth. More choices means the pitcher can come to the plate or attempt to pick the runner off at second. Caught learning? Try to stay alive in a rundown.

Shift the infield and outfield according to each hitter. The centerfield view offers a scout's insight as to the hitter's tendencies. Will you play at normal depth, guard the lines or put on a custom shift? Remember, the batter has options as well. He may go to right, bunt or drill it over your head.

Seven different stadiums. Five different views. Step on the turf of seven familiar big league ballparks. Catch the game from five network TV field perspectives: upper deck overview, behind the pitcher, behind the plate or left and right infield views. The "Game Of The Week" crew would be proud.

TV Instant Replay feature. Want to start a bench clearing brawl? Then show your opponent that triple you just belted, one more time, with the Instant Replay feature. You can pause it, play it at normal speed, slow motion or - if you really want to rub it in - frame-by-frame.

Pull-down menus make managing easy: A winning manager pushes all the right buttons. Pencil in a starting line-up based on who's going good. And if they start going bad? Pull the starters and pinch hit. Feel like trading all of these bums? Go ahead You can build your very own dream team with the team editor feature.

item.title: Weird Dreams
item.description:
About This Game

ATARI PRESENTS is a series of titles geared toward the preservation of cult classics, forgotten favorites, and titles that would otherwise be lost to time. In the spirit of that, each ATARI PRESENTS title is presented unchanged from its original version other than providing the means to play them on modern hardware. Even the store description below is the very same language used to describe the title at the time of its release. Please enjoy!

Imagine yourself in a world full of nightmares with Dali-esque creatures and mind-eating eyes. Picture yourself in an upside down landscape. Alone in a weird dream and wondering... what the... ?!

Imported from England, this is the computer game that everyone is talking about - or soon will be - in excited whispers and bewildered exclamations.

It's the game with the soccer ball that devours knife-wielding little girls... then burps.

The one with totem pole heads hopping on kangaroo bodies under skies full of fish.

The one with a giant killer bee that wants your cotton candy, the grandfather clock that points the way, and the lawn mower than grinds you to a bloody pulp.

Like the famous ink-plot test, the bizarre scenes, puzzle and arcade style challenges in Weird Dreams will mean different things to different people.

Some will think them uproariously funny.

Others will think them strange and unsettling.

Still others will be outright offended.

Decide for yourself.

One thing is certain: there has never been a computer game like Weird Dreams. You have to play it to believe it.

---

'Weird Dreams is a cinematic, third-person platform game with action and puzzle elements. The game contains bizarre levels and unorthodox activities, including feeding a wasp cotton candy, beating up hopping totem poles with fish from the sky, and an encounter with a baked chicken in a haunted house. The game comes with a "short novel" that explains the plot in detail and serves as copy protection.' - MobyGames

item.title: Zapper: One Wicked Cricket
item.description:
About This Game

ATARI PRESENTS is a series of titles geared toward the preservation of cult classics, forgotten favorites, and titles that would otherwise be lost to time. In the spirit of that, each ATARI PRESENTS title is presented unchanged from its original version other than providing the means to play them on modern hardware. Even the store description below is the very same language used to describe the title at the time of its release. Please enjoy!

Zapper is an action-packed and addictive game that starts with the ‚Äúavoid-em-up‚Äù game play mechanics of Blitz Games‚Äô own Frogger 2: Swampy‚Äôs Revenge, and then takes the action to a whole new level. In this action-adventure game, Zapper (a cricket) hops his way through six interactive worlds in a quest to find his brother, held captive by the evil magpie queen. Dangerous traps and even more dangerous enemies await Zapper. It will take fast-footed skill and timing to conquer all the worlds and survive the final showdown with the magpie queen.

GAME FEATURES:


- Classic ‚Äúavoid-em-up‚Äù game play from the makers of Frogger 2: Swampy‚Äôs Revenge: Blitz Games.

- Unique enemies and traps to thwart Zapper on his quest.

- Intuitive control system with increasingly complex levels makes Zapper a pick-up-and-play treat for both novice and seasoned gamers.

item.title: Lightspeed
item.description:
About This Game

ATARI PRESENTS is a series of titles geared toward the preservation of cult classics, forgotten favorites, and titles that would otherwise be lost to time. In the spirit of that, each ATARI PRESENTS title is presented unchanged from its original version other than providing the means to play them on modern hardware. Even the store description below is the very same language used to describe the title at the time of its release. Please enjoy!

You're the only human in a huge, robotic space ship, flying at incredible speeds through deep space. Your mission: find and settle a new planet where humanity can thrive. Combat is inevitable, but you'll need more than flying skills to succeed. You'll also need resourcefulness, charm and political skill to help you negotiate with the bizarre, intelligent - sometimes hostile - beings who correctly see you as the alien.

3D Combat Flight Simulation Like You've Never Seen

Earth-bound simulations spend most of their graphic power on landmarks and other terrain. But since there's no terrain in the black void of out space, Lightspeed devotes its Super 3D Graphics power to showing space ships in breathtaking detail and animating them with unprecedented smoothness.

- Pilot a starship 15,000 feet long

- Customize your ship for the performance you need

- Control remote fightercraft in strategic battles with intelligent enemies

Fascinating Role-Playing Depth

Multiple star clusters await your exploration, each with unique challenges. A dozen solar systems spin through each cluster; scores of planets revolve around each sun. Most important, 25 species of aliens require your constant attention.

- The Broodsmasters - sinister, manipulative and eager for universal domination

- The Lutin - quasi-intelligent, with no memory and no concept of the future

- The Cicisbeo - totally self-absorbed, vain and arrogant

item.title: Nothing Good Can Come Of This
item.description:
About This Game

A two-player local fighting game that strips combat down to its rawest form. Set in a bare room, players engage in intense fights over possession of a gun and its ammunition.

Features:


Fast-Paced, High-Stakes Combat: Brace yourself for quick and violent matches. Every second counts, and a single misstep can drastically change the course of a match.

A Fistfight over a Gun: Matches kick off with the drop of a gun and a single piece of ammo. Master the art of disarming your opponent and turn the fight in your favor.

Easy to Learn, Difficult to Master: The game's intuitive design means anyone can pick it up in seconds, but mastering it is a different story. It takes skill, strategy, and quick thinking to consistently come out on top.

Tournament Mode: Compete in Single Elimination or Round Robin brackets, a maximum of 32 players. Whether you're hosting a party or a competitive gaming event, this mode is perfect for testing skills and determining a champion.

Arcade Mode: Comes with additional support for "Credit" and "Free Play" modes, attract screens, and a simplified UI for use in arcade cabinets.

Nothing Good Can Come Of This is a part of the Arcade Commons collective in New York City. It has been featured at the MAGFest Indie Arcade.
Trailer music is Woochia - The Forbidden Door Pt.2, provided by Jamendo.

item.title: Puzzlerio
item.description:
About This Game

Puzzlerio is a minimalist and relaxing experience where you will create a factory that takes ores from one point to another. Refine ores to turn them into bar ores, use different resources to transport the ores and do everything necessary to complete the factory.

Transport ores with the Transport Belt


Refine ores with the Furnace


Take ores from one transport belt to another with the Inserter


Transport ores underground with the Tunnel


  • 5 itens to use in creating factories;
  • 50 levels ranging from easy to difficult;
  • Background music calm and relaxing to make your journey more complete;
